EnhanceR Symposium 2022

Research IT Trends in Switzerland

  • Home
  • Timetable
  • Registration

EnhanceR Symposium 2022 will take place in Bern on Tuesday, November 29, 2022.

Location: Hochschulstrasse 4, Hauptgebäude, room 501 (Kuppelraum)

Overview schedule
9:30–10:00 Registration / Coffee
10:00–10:30 Welcome
10:30–13:00 Show-and-tell parallel sessions (see below)
13:00–14:00 Lunch (restaurant Grosse Schanze)
14:00–15:00 Community needs discussion
15:00–16:00 Show-and-tell parallel sessions (see below)
16:00–16:15 Farewell
